content: निसर्गः {@--1@} Bestowing, granting, presenting, giving away; <ls>Ms. 8. 143.</ls> {@--2@} A grant. {@--3@} Evacuation, voiding excrement. {@--4@} Abandoning, relinquishing. {@--5@} Creation. {@--6@} Nature, natural character, natural state or condition; निसर्गदुर्बोधं <ls>Ki. 1. 6</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">18. 31</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 35</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 16</ls>; निसर्गतः, निसर्गेण ‘by nature’, or ‘naturally’. {@--7@} Exchange, barter.
